author: Koimoi.com Team
title: Watch: Rajkummar Rao Recount His Experience Of Working On Trapped In This Making Video
text: tweet Rajkummar Rao is all set to give us yet another impressive performance with his next film Trapped . In this making video of the film, we see Rajkummar Rao preparing for the challenging role, that involves a sort of a breakdown, after he gets trapped. Director Vikramaditya Motwane is also seen talking about how hard-working Rajkummar is and what he had to go through to get things right. Watch the video here: The film revolves around a man who gets trapped in a high rise without food, water and electricity. The Making of Trapped | Rajkummar Rao | Vikramaditya Motwane Trapped is all set to release on 17th March, 2017. TAGS
